Header: Malik Samarawickrama wants the names revealed
Content: Minister Malik Samarawickrema has written to the President’s Secretary requesting him to reveal if there is a list which includes the names of people who have allegedly taken money from Perpetual Treasuries or its affiliated companies.  Certain Websites have levelled accusations against parliamentarians alleging that they have taken money from Perpetual Treasuries or its affiliated companies. The Minister has rejected allegations levelled against him in this connection. Minister Malik Samarawickrama in his letter states that he has never taken money from those companies or individuals. The Minister has requested the President’s Secretary to reveal the names, if there is such a list in the Bond Commission Report or at the Attorney General’s Department.
